question_text: How would you design a scalable and secure multi-agent system on Google Cloud Platform capable of complex, long-running workflows?
hook_text: Building autonomous AI agents? Here's how to scale them securely on Google Cloud!
cta_text: Follow for advanced GCP AI architectures!

answer_sections.title: Vertex AI Agent Builder: Core
answer_sections.text: Vertex AI Agent Builder: Full-stack for Agent Development and Runtime.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: GCP's Vertex AI Agent Builder is your comprehensive platform, providing the tools and managed runtime needed for end-to-end agent development and secure execution.

answer_sections.title: Orchestration & Secure Communication
answer_sections.text: Orchestrate multi-agents, secure communication with A2A Protocol and Agentic IAM.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: For complex tasks, orchestrate multiple agents using patterns like coordinators. Secure inter-agent communication via A2A Protocol and fine-grained access with Agentic IAM.

answer_sections.title: Grounding & Real-time Reasoning
answer_sections.text: Ground agents with Vertex AI Search. Real-time data via BigQuery Continuous Queries.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Ensure agents are factual by grounding them with Vertex AI Search for RAG. Leverage BigQuery Continuous Queries for real-time data access and dynamic reasoning.
